events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Developer position at our company. Your resume looks impressive and matches many of the required skills.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review by our technical team.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be in contact to guide you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
Your initial screening interview went very well. The recruiter noted your experience with software development and relevant technical skills.
You responded promptly confirming your availability for the next round of interviews. Your enthusiasm for the role is appreciated.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developer team for next Monday at 10 AM. Please prepare accordingly.
Your technical interview was completed successfully. The panel was impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
The HR interview has been scheduled for Wednesday at 3 PM. This will cover company culture, benefits, and other relevant topics.
